data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Mymensingh. Through your servants plant 1,022 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jharudar people.
Spirit, help every believer in Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Mymensingh to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 5,088,567 who are far from you in Mymensingh, Dhaka, Bangladesh from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Mymensingh
location.people_groups_list: Khairwar, Jat Atra, Jat (Muslim traditions), Kapali, Kaora
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khairwar (500), Jat Atra (4,000), Jat (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Kapali (205,000), Kaora (5,100)
